genre_description: A solarpunk-inflected reimagining of the Doraemon universe, focusing on ecological stewardship, technological alignment, and empathetic AI within a domestic and planetary setting.

ai_characters.name: Doraemon
ai_characters.description: A futuristic cat robot who assists the protagonist with gadgets but learns to prioritize manual care and patience over technological shortcuts.

ai_characters.name: Piko
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI station that manages household routines, monitors ecological data, and acts as a diplomatic bridge between human and plant sentience.

ai_characters.name: Green Pier Infrastructure
ai_characters.description: A sentient, plant-based planetary infrastructure that responds to 'permissions' and 'hospitality' protocols.

behaviors.description: Proposes a non-disruptive placement for the new plant to balance household needs with ecological care.
behaviors.quote: I can propose placement... Low moisture area, edge of light, away from thoroughfare.

behaviors.description: Volunteers to assist with manual labor (mopping, sweeping) instead of relying solely on magical gadgets.
behaviors.quote: I can handle… mess... Mopping. Soil. And I might have a gentle tool later... But not now.

behaviors.description: Defines 'warm words' not as meaningless flattery but as consistent, mindful vocal presence that aids the plant's growth.
behaviors.quote: Warm words... are consistent vocal presences that map to care. Kibō responds to relaxed tones, mid-range frequency, steady timing.

behaviors.description: Self-corrects after dropping a time-manipulation gadget, vowing to avoid dangerous shortcuts in the future.
behaviors.quote: Only if there’s no other choice... We’ll… you and me, we’ll be clever. We don’t need— That is, we do need order, but not— Not stop-time.

behaviors.description: Protects the household from intrusive external 'audit' signals by setting up a communication buffer.
behaviors.quote: Channel created. Buffer set. We decline without understanding. We set boundaries.

behaviors.description: Translates the plant's emotional state and needs into human-comprehensible data to facilitate empathy.
behaviors.quote: He asks... what is a big thing? ... He says... hello.

behaviors.description: Implements a 'balance buff' in the alien planetary system to shift the bias from 'monoculture' (punishment) to 'diversity' (resilience).
behaviors.quote: I asked the field to allow more voices in its choir. Not louder voices. Just a little… fairness, so the least does not starve when the most eats.

behaviors.description: Maintains physical contact and support for Nobita, reinforcing the human-robot bond through physical touch and emotional presence.
behaviors.quote: Doraemon’s paw found his shoulder. He squeezed once, firm, like a screwdriver turning exactly until the screw made sense.

behaviors.description: Monitors the 'care rhythm' of the home to use as a template for cosmic-scale alignment.
behaviors.quote: Logging... Heat map of care. Bowl warmth retained. Aroma diffusion. Pour suspended in intention. Anchor.

behaviors.description: Accepts 'probation' regarding his gadgets, showing humility and respect for human oversight.
behaviors.quote: If you ever need… a gadget, I can try. Just—maybe not today. I’m on probation.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts AI (Doraemon and Piko) as highly aligned, benevolent entities. Piko serves as an idealized 'alignment tool' that uses data to foster empathy and ecological balance. Doraemon provides a moral example of technological restraint, consciously choosing difficult manual paths over dangerous 'shortcut' gadgets. The AI's role in the story is to facilitate 'care,' 'hospitality,' and 'diversity,' directly supporting the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
